channel.title: Having a hard time with the function SendKeys, please help :)?
channel.description:
program new; begin MoveMouse(400, 315); ClickMouse(400,315,1); SendKeys ('cool'); MoveMouse (600, 357); ClickMouse(600,357,1); Wait(200); WriteLn('Searched "cool" on Google.com') end.
[Error] (6:24): Invalid number of parameters at line 5 Compiling failed. The website for simba is offline... so I was wondering if you all could help :)?

item.title: Having a hard time with the function SendKeys, please help :)?
item.dc:creator: @kyocera kyocera
item.description:
@kyocera wrote:

Wizzup?:

Define, down?

everyday around 8:00 - 9:30 (eastern U.S. time) I can not connect to the site. “cannot connect to this webpage”.

It’s up atm though

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kyocera kyocera
item.description:
@kyocera wrote:

Wizzup?:

http://docs.villavu.com/simba/scriptref/mouseandkeyboard.html#sendkeys

down for me again :S

on another note, I’m trying to click on a bitmap now is there a command to do that?

here’s what I’, doing right now…

program new; {$i SRL\SRL.scar} var bingsearch: integer; procedure LoadBitmap; begin SetupSRL;

bingsearch := BitmapFromString(26, 24, ‘meJytkz1LA0EQhn9QEgyoKWwstM’ +
‘wfEEERQRAFCxEbEVRQSATBCIKglY2WYiGChYX2YiEWFlaiufMjJKI’ +
‘mOX3OuZsse5crQpaX49ibfW5m9p3c2HMuVP9EoL7JQL1TLWVnXkz1’ +
‘zLWUmfdVPK12C5Ve8NVFlNASUKPF14Pz2tXd9+1jHfHOTjtUavElF’ +
‘sUzv+IC+Y1b7PM1ikotlWOzIoH3mtdsxsL8Vf3yiLFQQrOyGl4sO5’ +
‘UABHP7pEom1MVx3uHIJ2IGlssmCkV7dXz9KVk9PDfgWG2HcP9UF+D’ +
‘ZTdVEKU1RJPbT8CMBRlHSq3zBlZivHw94i7biWGaY3n2XxGh1ghn0’ +
‘gmYPPxSFLF+tHlUkjBYl+Kp0UZMw/K+o9JpjWRSa5Ia1Eny1d/npe’ +
‘V5AC1GpdcdyO5XKT/FqOxTJ8JUYgH6lISq94ViDw3FcIUDIsSgIkh’ +
‘huya27isoUnOgM0jG1KEALNb7/pr+jXhNl0aS0oVVHDKBzRDNHSn5’ +
‘LMZju40YSM1EmTVD4Tc0pS4ry/pduEjO4+WaherZcE0WLzEnniM6R’ +
‘OaEU6Ldrw0YJTVFmIaDwOaLnHGfc8Bjv0vZYlK/QVMRrLUw03bNm0’ +
‘PRVLCq7E9AYSc2KK2MSO0ApjYrk3hlkrq8zlNDEopSGBzrOShTr9s’ +
‘5Q6A/NOpLi’);

end;
procedure FindBMP;
var
x, y: integer;
begin
if FindBitmapToleranceIn(bingsearch, x, y, 381, 149, 809, 198, 25) then
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, True);
end;
begin
end.

@kyocera wrote:

program new; begin MoveMouse(400, 315); ClickMouse(400,315,1); SendKeys ('cool');

MoveMouse (600, 357);
ClickMouse(600,357,1);
Wait(200);

WriteLn(‘Searched “cool” on Google.com’)
end.

[Error] (6:24): Invalid number of parameters at line 5
Compiling failed.

The website for simba is offline… so I was wondering if you all could help :)?
